required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Assessment of Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems - Evaluation of Oxygen Dependency
clinical_study.official_title: Prüfung Von Blutzuckermesssystemen - Bewertung Der Sauerstoffabhängigkeit

lead_sponsor.agency: Institut für Diabetes-Technologie Forschungs- und Entwicklungsgesellschaft mbH an der Universität Ulm

clinical_study.source: Institut für Diabetes-Technologie Forschungs- und Entwicklungsgesellschaft mbH an der Universität Ulm

brief_summary.textblock: Systems for blood glucose monitoring with glucose oxidase enzyme reaction on test strips can be affected by the partial pressure of oxygen of the blood sample. In this study, we investigate the influence of different partial pressure of oxygen in blood samples on measurement results. Systems with labelled oxygen-dependency as well as systems without labelled oxygen-dependency are evaluated.

primary_outcome.measure: Influence of the blood sample`s partial pressure on blood glucose measurement results
primary_outcome.time_frame: For each sample, preparation and measurment procedure have an expected duration of about 2 hours

intervention.intervention_name: 6 blood glucose monitoring systems for self-testing

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 18 years of age or older
- male or female subjects with type 1 or type 2 diabetes or healthy subjects
- signed informed consent form
Exclusion Criteria:
- pregnancy or lactation period
- severe acute illness that, in the opinion of the investigator, might pose additional risk to the subject
- severe chronic illness that, in the opinion of the investigator, might pose additional risk to the subject

overall_official.affiliation: Institut für Diabetes-Technologie Forschungs- und Entwicklungsgesellschaft an der Universität Ulm

facility.name: Institut für Diabetes-Technologie Forschungs- und Entwicklungsgesellschaft an der Universität Ulm

results_reference.citation: Baumstark A, Schmid C, Pleus S, Haug C, Freckmann G. Influence of partial pressure of oxygen in blood samples on measurement performance in glucose-oxidase-based systems for self-monitoring of blood glucose. J Diabetes Sci Technol. 2013 Nov 1;7(6):1513-21.
